name: New Passivhaus technologies and innovations
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session explores the new technologies, systems and innovations that make achieving Passivhaus simpler, cheaper and easier. These range from individual components to whole house systems that are manufactured offsite.

presentations.name: New technologies and innovations
presentations.speakers: John Barnham, Head of Sustainable Investment, Orbit Heart of England

presentations.name: Lessons from Europe - looking at mass production off site to ease construction costs:
presentations.speakers: David Craddock, Technical Director, EBS elk

presentations.name: European Case Study - developing timber wood supply chain in the UK
